abstract: Unidentified man alleges that Philadelphia 76ers center Jahlil Okafor assaulted him outside Boston nightclub.
lead_paragraph: A man came forward saying that Jahlil Okafor, a 19-year-old rookie center for the Philadelphia 76ers, had assaulted him during a fight in Boston that was recorded on a cellphone and posted online, the police said.
snippet: A man came forward saying that Jahlil Okafor, a 19-year-old rookie center for the Philadelphia 76ers, had assaulted him during a fight in Boston that was recorded on a cellphone and posted online, the police said.
